p.k: Ben, Gwen, and Max meet a family that appears to be a mirror image of them. / In the heart of Silicon Valley, Ben has to stop Victorian villain Steam Smythe from securing an epic power source sealed in a Tesla time capsule. / During Chefapalooza in the Rocky Montains, three famous chefs and infamous bad-guys, The Tri-Chefta, hunt down Wildvine in hopes of creating their most exotic dish to date. / No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons waiting on line at the World of Wet Water Park, is the nefarious Frightwig disguised as a common girl.
